original_text: Then they brought in the golden vessels that had been taken out of the temple, the house of God in Jerusalem, and the king and his lords, his wives, and his concubines drank from them.
korean_text: 이에 예루살렘 하나님의 전 성소 중에서 탈취하여 온 금 그릇을 가져오매 왕이 그 귀족들과 왕후들과 후궁들과 더불어 그것으로 마시더라

sentences.original_text: Then they brought in the golden vessels
that had been taken out of the temple
the house of God in Jerusalem
and the king and his lords
and his concubines drank from them
